oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Copy print photograph, Sgt. John Dunlap Dickson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Copy print of framed photograph of Sgt. John Dunlap Dickson, at "port arms" with 1903 Springfield and in stateside uniform that includes campaign hat and canvas leggings. The picture was taken at Ft. Oglethorpe, Ga. Dickson served in Co. B, 54th Inf. He was working as a rancher in Montana before the war but returned to his hometown of Chicago, Ill. to enlist.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Dickson, John Dunlap
